title: MAGIX Music Maker 2023 Plus - Make the music you love I Audio software I Music program I Windows 10 / 11 I 1 PC licence
description:
The new MUSIC MAKER 2023 PLUS is more powerful, more versatile, and even more fun than before! Make your own songs and beats quickly – no experience required. No other music production software gets you amazing results this quickly.

MUSIC MAKER PLUS offers even more creative possibilities: Choose from thousands of sounds, loops, and instruments to build completely new songs per drag & drop. Build your own drum patterns in just a few clicks to create even fatter beats using Beatbox Pro. Get inspired!

Click to combine a massive range of drums, sounds, and rhythms – building beats just got a lot more intuitive. This allows you to simply create music like a pro – no previous experience required.
